existing_features.title: Add a new Terms of Service (TOS) page that is accessible via a new route (e.g., "/tos") and uses English user-facing text.
Update the Payment Method page to provide a clear next-step navigation to the new TOS page (i.e., a prominent button/link placed after the payment-method content).
Expose the new TOS page in site navigation data so it appears after "Payment Method" in the configured navigation list, and add it to the footer links where appropriate.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a Terms of Service (TOS) page shown after the payment method step

projectName: Add Terms of Service page after Payment Method
